thread.title: Africa Event Xcellence Director honoured as one of South Africa's Top 40 women in MICE
thread.title_full: Africa Event Xcellence Director honoured as one of South Africa's Top 40 women in MICE

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Africa Event Xcellence Director honoured as one of South Africa's Top 40 women in MICE
text:
Africa Event Xcellence Director honoured as one of South Africa's Top 40 women in MICE Africa Event Xcellence Director honoured as one of South Africa's Top 40 women in MICE Details Category: Awards   15:15 Africa Event Xcellence (AEX) has announced that Janine Meyer, Director of AEX has been recognised, nominated and awarded as one of South Africaâ€™s Top 40 Woman in MICE 2015 (Meetings, Incentives Conferences and Exhibitions).African Event Xcellence is a leading company within the MICE industry of Southern Africa, with over 25-years of hands-on experience in providing event management, marketing and training, to distinguished clientele. 
3sMedia, the custodians of 40 Women in MICE, recognises the important role women play in the meetings, incentives, conferencing and exhibition industry. This outstanding initiative plays an important role in providing a platform that motivates, inspires and supports women in the industry to achieve both personal and professional goals.
